attributes.action: Spirit Healthcare – Blood Glucose Meter Accuracy Campaign
attributes.additional_details:
•         Spirit Healthcare believes that people with diabetes deserve access to meters that have proven accuracy.
•         We therefore propose a requirement for annual UK testing to ensure continued compliance with international standards.
•         This test should be carried out by an independent body with the authority to withdraw non-compliant products from the market.
•         This test should be funded by companies currently within the market to ensure no additional cost to the National Health Service.
•         For more information visit: http://meteraccuracycampaign.org.uk/
